title: (x) "Coactive Training" similar to Gill Sans - Bliss {Marc O}
content:
can somebody please tell me what this font is.... it’s very similar to Gill Sans but the detailing to the “g” is different....

cheers

ric

 [‹ (x) Florascape logo - Lucida Sans {Fabio}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015120117/http:/typophile.com/node/15397 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Roppongi Hills logo - custom designed by Jonathan Barnbrook {Fernando} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015120117/http:/typophile.com/node/15386 "Go to next forum topic")
author: richard frankland

comments.content:
This is Jeremy Tankard’s Bliss, a modern sans influenced by classic British faces like Gill Sans and Edward Johnston’s Underground type:

[http://www.typography.net/type/bliss.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015120117/http:/www.typography.net/type/bliss.htm "http://www.typography.net/type/bliss.htm")
At first I thought “charcoal,” but, no...
cheers marcox... owe you a pint!
